column5: She's a beaut. Which store did you purchase it from?

Paul you should see alot of the portables on sale soon you will be surprised to see how much they liquidate them for.I bought mine at CDN Tire a few yrs ago Reg.Price $399.00 got it for $269.99 keep your eyes open.I will miss your modifications of Tarpis Maximus.MTP     Nice hut Bassman looks nice and roomy.MTP
They're roomy as all heck.8ft x 8ft w/ a 10 ft peak,folding 1 piece frame set up in 5 minutes.Sears sells em.  Bassman
That's a nice looking hut.  Where did you purchase and how many $$$ did you have to lay out?  John
Dang that is a nice hut is the tear down as easy as the setup?
dat is da bomb  my 2 cents  2many
They sell for $259 in Sears.They set up and tear down in about 5 minutes.they're a one piece folding frame with a tent that slips over.It's awesome.  Bassman
